message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at 125?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more like $110. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at 122?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more like $115. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $110.
I understand you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of 122. How about we meet at 118?
